attributes.additional_details: Fixed rate for csa.  children are not worth more than the other.why should one child be 25 pound   and another be 80 pound a week, all children who u live with or apart from should be given the same amount. Not more you earn more u pay. That's why a lot of fathers are losing homes as they can't afford to live. The system really needs looking into and remembering the receiving parent is already getting some money from government.eg child tax credit and if non parent gets it to. The receiving parent gets it twice.
